name: Ball Drop (epicjim2005)
description:
BallDrop

HIGHLY RECOMENDED TO DOWNLOAD GAME! - This will giver better performance and save progress

If playing on chrome, make sure to TURN ON HARDWARE ACCELERATION for far greater performance

Ball Drop is a very challenging puzzle game where you need to place and control objects to get the ball into the hole. You must race against time to place the objects before the ball auto-drops.

See if you can beat all 30 levels! and collect all the skins!

If you played the game be sure to spread the word and write some feedback in the comments!

Playable Windows 10 and supported browsers

Controls:

F - To drop the ball

LMB - To spawn objects and move them

Q or E - To rotate objects while moving them

WASD - to move view around

R - To zoom in/out

ESC or P - To pause the game

Known bugs:

- Dragging platforms will not always work

- Dropping ball audio plays after launching

To see updates on future games or ideas visit my Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrvoKhJO5SVp-0Lh1nJlPJg
